title: "How can hypnosis improve athletic performance in football players?"
first_phrase: The last 200 tokens of this text focus on the use of hypnosis in the game of soccer, with the aim of improving the performance of individual players both mentally and physically. The techniques of individual and group hypnosis, used after decongesting the solar plexus, help players concentrate and become more lucid, increasing perceptual possibilities and improving the relationship between coach and athletes. The collective hypnosis state is also useful in creating a positive expectation of the game, eliminating fear and stress. This chapter concludes with a reference to the use of hypnosis in marketing, dedicated to the art of suggestion both on stage and in everyday life.
